Type.Name: Style

TypeSignature.Value: public class Style : GLib.Object, IWrapper, IDisposable

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Gets the foreground color for a particular state
Docs.param: To be added: an object of type 'Gtk.StateType'
Docs.returns: To be added: an object of type 'Gdk.Color'

Docs.summary: Sets the background of to the background color or pixmap specified by style for the state.
Docs.returns: A color to be used for the background.

Docs.summary: Copy this style object to a new style object.
Docs.returns: A , a duplicate of this style.

Docs.param: To be added: an object of type 'string'
Docs.returns: To be added: an object of type 'Gtk.IconSet'

Docs.summary: Attaches a style to a window; this process allocates the colors and creates the GCs (graphics components) for the style - it specializes it to a particular visual and colormap. The process may involve the creation of a new style if the style has already been attached to a window with a different style and colormap.
Docs.param: , the window to attach the style to
Docs.returns: Either , or a newly-created . If the style is newly created, the style parameter will be dereferenced, and the new style will have a reference count belonging to the caller.

Docs.summary: Disposes the resources associated with the object.

Docs.returns: An instance of Style, wrapping the C object.

remarks.para: This is an internal constructor, and should not be used by user code.

Docs.returns: A new

public static void PaintBox (Gtk.Style style, Gdk.Window window, Gtk.StateType state_type, Gtk.ShadowType shadow_type, Gdk.Rectangle area, Gtk.Widget widget, string detail, int x, int y, int width, int height);
